channel.title: control on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in control on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: A Brave New World of Equilibrium
item.description: The battle between emotion and control is an old one. It is fought by each of us in our lives as well as philosophers at a more conceptual level.

item.title: Types of Love: An Analysis.
item.description: It is perhaps important to differentiate the various meaning that we refer to when we say the word love. Often ‘love’ is used in the place of a more suitable word.
